structure.unit: GENERAL PROVISIONS AS TO OFFICES AND OFFICERS -- SOCIAL SECURITY FOR PUBLIC EMPLOYEES -- EMPLOYEES RETIREMENT SYSTEM

law.history: Repealed 2000 Ky. Acts ch. 385, sec. 42, effective July 14, 2000. -- Amended 1994 Ky. Acts ch. 406, sec. 9, effective April 11, 1994. -- Created 1990 Ky. Acts ch. 480, sec. 6, effective July 13, 1990.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Persons employed by Legislative Research Commission for six legislative bienniums may purchase credit in Kentucky Employees Retirement System.
